english_example_sentence: If the little child leaves school early, his mother worries.
russian_example_sentence: Если маленький ребенок рано покинет школу, его мать будет волноваться.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük çocuk okuldan erken ayrılsa, annesi endişelenir.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Küçük çocuk okuldan erken ______, annesi endişelenir.
